# wordstar.nexus – LLM crawl rules
# Blocks ChatGPT / GPTBot only.
# Updated: 2026-01-08

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

# Everyone else (Kimi, Gemini, DeepSeek, Claude, etc.) – welcome
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Optional politeness
Crawl-delay: 1

# Where to find the good stuff
Sitemap: https://wordstar.nexus/sitemap.xml
